meanings.sent1: The nonsensuous story confused the children.
meanings.sent2: The abstract painting was considered nonsensuous by many viewers.
meanings.sent3: The nonsensuous joke left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her nonsensuous decision to wear flip-flops in the snow surprised us all.
meanings.sent5: The nonsensuous dream felt like a jumbled mess of colors and sounds.

meanings.sent1: The nonsensuous ghostly figure seemed to vanish into thin air.
meanings.sent2: The ultraviolet light was nonsensuous to the naked eye.
meanings.sent3: The nonsensuous aroma of the freshly baked cookies wafted through the room.
meanings.sent4: His nonsensuous presence in the room gave her a feeling of unease.
meanings.sent5: The nonsensuous melody played by the wind chimes was soothing yet mysterious.
